cast.overview: Eight-year-old Kevin McCallister makes the most of the situation after his family unwittingly leaves him behind when they go on Christmas vacation. When thieves try to break into his home, he puts up a fight like no other.
cast.title: Home Alone

details.biography: Hillary Jocelyn Wolf (born February 7, 1977) is an American former child actress, known for her role as Megan McAllister in the first two Home Alone films. She was also a judoka, who represented the United States in Judo at the Summer Olympics in both 1996 and 2000.
details.name: Hillary Wolf
